column3: “A nice mellow sedation without catatonia combined with a very heady high that will open creative doors while keeping the demons away. Paranoia takes a detour as you ride the super highway of intellectual transcendence combined with uber productive creative endeavors. Even making toast will turn into a project worthy of  the Food network under the influence of this sweet bud. Appetite seemed unaffected but like all TH...”

“Perfect morning and afternoon strain for when u need a boost of energy, or when your stressed out or battling depression Jack Skellington won't let u down. The pheno I smoke has a fruity citrus, woody, nutty flavor and most definitely is my favorite strain, tested at 26.8% from Leef.”

“My first review on Leafly!

Aroma is citrus and slightly petroleum. Flavors follow suit. Seems to burn clean. Not a lot of lingering flavor.

This is a very good get 'er done" strain! Great for puttering around the house
column4: hanging with friends (kind of gives me the giggles) or working on light-duty projects. Uplifting and energizing. Me likey!”"

column3: “This shit had me in Narnia. Mr. Tumnus and Aslan helped me along the way.”
“This is the best weed ever. My favorite in fact. If you ever get your hands on this SAVOR every moment”
“smelled great. Tasted very good and smooth. I enjoyed the very first hit. I had the intention of sharing with people but I'm going to keep it for myself. mwahahaha”

“A new favorite by far, Jack Skellington brought me into a sense of well being and creativity. As someone with moderate arthritis, this strain brought relief from pain, but it was still slightly there. If you're looking for a great head high, this is the one.”

“Right Off the bat I notice that the strain is very strong scented. So I figure the cerebral buzz is gonna be intense. Hasheesh was I right... 2-3 puffs in from a pure hit pipe I was gooonnne. Mind tingling sensations turning into a face numbing first half hour haha. Which then  got me in a introspective and creative mood, so I put on some music. did I a body and soul good... definitely would recommend it for a daytim...”

“Very level experience didn't blow my lid off but that doesn't mean I don't like it. Some of the higher thc content strains are just a bit to much for someone without any tollerance. Overall very relaxed and enjoyable”
“Amazing. I was exhausted and crabby and this strain took all of the stress and put me in a great mood. I highly recommend it.”
“This has by far been my favorite in a long time it makes me remember the first time I ever smoke with the taste and felling it gives you”
“Really great for treating depression, anxiety and Panic disorder”
“This shit right here, is for sure in my top 5 maybe number 1 one of the best highs I ever had if you have the chance don't turn it down you'll regret it.”
“strong pungent odor. sweet smooth taste out of the Helix. would not recommend for beginners”

“Sorry ghost train haze, you’ve been replaced. jack skellington has new special place in my heart. 

it gives you a buzzing, amazing euphoric feeling while it also boosts your mood and inspires your inner artist.  absolutely great when you’ve been struggling with depression or lethargy.”
“Nice sativa. Super diesel dank ass aroma.”
“Nice sativa. Super diesel dank ass aroma.”

“Jack is a great strain, just not for me. Creativity is boosted in a introverted way. But don't expect to collaborate with this weed. Good for individual solo projects, or body movement, dancing and hands on media like finger painting.”
“I purchased this ol' girl and I was in for a ride....never again anxiety went out the roof....definatly a upper and not for me.”

“VERY fun mental high.  I was so absolutely entertained by my immediate surroundings and felt very creative and intense.  I give it 4 stars instead of 5 because it was an anti-social high, and coming down was an unpleasant experience.  When the medication wore off, I felt grumpy and ravenous.  This would be great for a solitary weekend of contemplation, reading, writing, and exploring.  Make sure you have room and spa...”

“LOTS of hair and LOTS of crystalline trichomes. Smells amazing, like citrus-ey diesel, and is very soft and breaks up easily into a pipe. Very smooth hit - even when you over-hit and cough it's a smooth release with minimal lung burn. Creative, euphoric, introspective high. Tastes as good as it smells.”

“I fell in love with this strain and can't wait till its back I'm my local shop.  I found this to be a very uplifting smoke, from the energy buzz, the clarity of mind to the ignited creative power I couldn't get enough and it seems others agreed as it seemed to sell out quickly. The only downside was it did have a diesel taste to it which I'm not a fan but the lemony citrus notes in it did help balance that out a bit....”
“Super dank and dense love the citrus flavor and the potent but mellow scent of it 🃏💀”
“Light and calming.  Reduces my depression and anxiety and depression helping me be relaxed yet productive.”

“I have a chronic illness and bought this in an oil. It has a very sticky consistency and you are instructed to use only a small amount. I put it in some food and it tastes like a very strong resin. It did help with my pain and my anxiety. I'm glad I tried it and would by it again.”

“Jack Skellington is a solid head high strain but not all that effective treating back pain so it's better to mix with a High CBD strain if you're using it for pain. The buds I got smelled fruity and tasted even fruitier when smoke or vaped.”
“If your work is of a creative nature, this is a great high. I always get inspired and start writing after I smoke this. Introspective, creative, and focused.”
“sweet, mellow and delicious.”

“Got this in flower and clone form a week ago. I am glad I grabbed the clone too. I haven't been that high in quite awhile and I sure enjoyed the experience. The flavor was clean and fresh, quite a bit of limonene in there. I can't wait to see what I can do with her. THC 18.82 CBD .05”

“As a grower i couldnt be any happier with TGA theyre line up of jack crosses are the best you can get varying on what kind of f1 youre looking for i suggest growing this beautiful plant indoors outside the colas dont really turn out as they do inside make sure this beauty stays warm and feed it abundantly and you will get this super glue feeling on the end product so oily not very dense but packs such a punch that yo...”

“Massive energy, waves of tropical flavors, uplifting and intense. 
I have a feeling this strain gets it's juiciness from it's momma Queen"

“Definetly a sativa but may have some slight indica effects ( I have always preferred indicas but this strain will give you a slight body buzz. Very relaxing, calming, and stress relieving high. The smell is very potent it will encompass a large sized room within a few minutes.”
“Great strain prior to exercise. Energetic and the exertion from the exercise keeps your head grounded through the euphoria.”

“Simplify marvelous, 
Feels like a non stop flow of euphoria,
Cleaned every room in my house!”
“definitely by far my newest favorite”

“A very nice all-around noontime smoke. It has a pleasant clean grassy odor, and a mild flavor. It's mellow on the lungs, too. Although it has a high potency for a sativa, and tested at 20.1% THC, it doesn't leave me feeling sedated. Provides a good mood to get things done, and has helped me a great deal with controlling anxiety.”
“Definitely one of my favorites. Mellow and creative.”
“Smooth, smooth, smooth. Nice, HAPPY euphoria. Would try again.👍”
“Loved it.”
“Smelled looked and tasted amazing definitely one of the nicest strains I've come by in a while now. It made me really sleepy and put me to sleep really fast”

“The nightmare before Christmas a classic movie with the outstanding delightful Jack Skellington. This reminisce strain goes above and beyond and delivers something demonic from the below the grave that's not so scary at all! 
The smooth citrus diesel like pungent tones makes it feel as you are sitting in the alternative Tim Burton world. 
Do not mistaken this for an average sativa, this is a MUST HAVE Halloween treat...”

“Wonderful yield, taste and harvest time.
It goes well with your morning coffee and all the way threw out the day.”
“The nugs looked soooo beautiful and the taste was pretty spicy with a kick to it.”
“Awesome daytime smoke. Great buzz without feeling too weighed down or sleepy. Smells very deisely with a little hit of lemon.”

“This was the first strain I ever tried with my depression in mind, and it was absolutely effective. A friendly, light strain that isn't too overwhelming with the scent or flavor. Expect some light, happy feelings.”

“Pretty impressed by this strain in 20 mg capsule concentrate form.If your trying to get rid of a migraine and have tried tinture,flower,shatter this maybe your go to for long lasting pain relieving effect's for 6hr's for me.”
“pure happiness.. didn't hear anything, I was in my own zone(are you saying it made you def?) All in all, going on the faves list..”

“strong strain. instant hit. crazy high and strong body stone. perfect afternoon chill out. for a sativa this is a bad ass strain. one of the most psychoactive strains ever put my hands on! a must try.”

“Deeply contemplative weed. Normally, sativas that cause hardcore introspection send me running; I'm prettymuch guaranteed an anxiety attack. This stuff was chill. All felt well. Thoughts that could have worked me into a frenzy with other sativas didn't affect my equilibrium. Very good strain.”

“best bud I've seen in quite a while. Nice strong smell and it got me after the first bowl. I could feel each smooth hit getting me higher and higher. awesome strain, it calmed my anxiety disorder and helped me chill. bong rips of this are a must, you'll be in the sky for a good while”
“Mellowing, couch dwelling.  Take when stressed or angry.”

“This was one of the first strains I ever smoked yet all this time later it's still one of my top faves. I think it's because this weed is really engaging. It makes you + anything seem super interesting. I can watch reruns of a show I've seen 100 times and watch it like it's the first, amazed by all the tiny details. It is uplifting and sometimes feels almost psychedelic. I'd say great for a day in only because it can...”
“amazing high. i want to sing.”
“Love it!”
“Just like the childhood movie character that would bring me joy and laughter, so does this strain.”
“Smelled looked and tasted amazing definitely one of the nicest strains I've come by in a while now. It made me really sleepy and put me to sleep really fast”
“Loved it.”
“Smooth, smooth, smooth. Nice, HAPPY euphoria. Would try again.👍”

“I wanted to revise my earlier review, which gave it only one star because it gave me a huge panic attack. A friend had some, and a her suggestion I tried this again mixed equal parts with a very-high-CBD strain (ACDC). THAT got me a decent sativa high without the panic. (I also vaped much less--just one good lungful.) I still say not for newbs, medical patients who don't like getting high as kite, and much care warra...”

“Started out as an uplifting flying feeling soon became dizziness and nausea. First time I chalked it up to the flu, but the second time it was definitely this. 
PSA: Use caution when giving it to your lightweight friends.”
“I suggest getting this strain made into a balm, salve, or lotion. GREAT for all day activities and uncomfortable places!”

“Smoked this bud a couple of times. Got to say, liked it both times.
 Smiling is a good thing. Seem to always get that happy, feeling good feeling. 
 :)”

“WOW!!!!! Honestly picked this up because of the name, had that good ol nerd moment. Now as it goes for the flower. It is amazing, a truly cerebral rush with this strain, almost no hybrid traits, the flavor of it it like a spicy citrus eased into  a woody earth tone. The tricrome Structure is also very impressive, with a coating that it could catwalk with this strain is a stunner. Be prepared to eat also, this one wil...”
“Definitely one of my favorites. Mellow and creative.”

“A very nice all-around noontime smoke. It has a pleasant clean grassy odor, and a mild flavor. It's mellow on the lungs, too. Although it has a high potency for a sativa, and tested at 20.1% THC, it doesn't leave me feeling sedated. Provides a good mood to get things done, and has helped me a great deal with controlling anxiety.”
“definitely by far my newest favorite”

“Simplify marvelous, 
Feels like a non stop flow of euphoria,
Cleaned every room in my house!”
“Great strain prior to exercise. Energetic and the exertion from the exercise keeps your head grounded through the euphoria.”

“This is the sativa strain that's perfect for indica lovers that like the heavy stone...but without feeling super tired. TBH the name actually put my off because I'm not a big fan of the Nightmare Christmas thing (hides in corner) but I'm glad I tried it! I'll be getting some again next time it's in”
“Very fragrant, beautiful red hairs and a overall pleasant taste. Two bongs rips had me feeling great in the head and it's been awhile since flowers have gotten me stoned. : ) A+ strain”
“Excellent! I just tried today and becomes my favorite one!”
“Sat me on my ass. Couldn't even play The Division. I kept toggling all my stats. Ended up just watching The Office and crashing out about an hour after getting high off one bowl.”

“Great for a morning and afternoon  smoke. Although it certainly can put me to sleep, it is not nearly as satisfying as others for a night time smoke. You'll definitely feel its effects, but won't be blazed with this strand.”

“I really like this one. 
I can smoke this without getting horrible muscle tension
It also gets me doing things at home after work. I only smoke a small amount, just enough for a good hit from a bong..
And there is no problem going to sleep.”
“It is great and wonderful.”
“Absolute favorite strain if I don't feel good or have a headache I instantly resort to this strain”
“Smoked this from a fresh Thick Ass-Glass beaker and couldn't feel my legs half way through. Gave me the hardest munchies I've ever had before.”
“Amazing strain”

“Excellent! All the terpenes I expected were there, the earthy lemon citrus of the Jack Herrer and the Diesel and Grapefruit taste of the Romulan. This is the only example of this strain in Orange County, so I believe this Dispensary should keep this strain and I look forward to watching the grow improve over time.”
“Perfect day smoke. Awesome Sativa alertness & creativity, good balance for anyone that suffers from a tad bit of anxiety. Love for focused creativity”
“First time I had this strain and I thinks its fantastic ...From the wonderful sweet taste to the great sativa stone. Bag appeal 10+”
“I like this one. it was relaxing, was real nice at the end of the day”
“Enjoy smoking this great taste..   Hella cough”

“Sticky Icky flower. My fingers were sticky even after I washed them 30 minutes after the fact. I haven't seen bud this beautiful in years and I live in Seatle. Stoney as shit also. It reminded me of the high I use to get when I first toked up.”
“Second time I've grabbed this strain at a dispense in Grand Rapids. Love the sweet slight diesel taste. Its a undescribable flavor profile. Great daytime smoke”
“This Jack Skel is amazing! First time smoking this strain was today and I must say I need more. It makes my head tingle with a chilling sensation.”
